p: Identified components were assigned to several groups (see Table 3) and samples were characterized by the amounts of several component types. The highest amount of investigated essential oils was observed in black poplar sample: PN-3 (4.33%). The remaining P. nigra samples exhibited a range of 0.50% to 1.50% of EOs. P. tremula EOsâ€™ content varied from trace amount (<0.05%) to 0.36%. Propolis contained 0.07% to 2.8% of EOs.
